ValidationRule.description: When a Claim Case is moving beyond Submitted, the Address needs to be verified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) <> 'Draft', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) <> 'Submitted', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) <> 'Closed', Account.RecordType.Name = 'Building Location', TEXT(Account.Address_Verification_Status__c) <> 'Verified' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Account's Address must be verified before moving beyond the "Submitted" stage
